data.name: 0000 (381.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Understood. I'll do my best to lead Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0001 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thanks, I really appreciate it.

data.name: 0002 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For the time being, our goal has been set. Though I'm still concerned about this situation.

data.name: 0003 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We haven't encountered any major problems yet, but you never know…

data.name: 0004 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, have you figured out the location of the data lifeform or whatever it's called?

data.name: 0006 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Not yet.

data.name: 0007 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: More time is required to pinpoint its coordinates.

data.name: 0008 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What kind of data lifeform could this be that even Miss Nagato's methods can't pinpoint it?

data.name: 0009 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You say that as if you're questioning its existence. Nagato told us about it, you know.

data.name: 0011 (381.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Could it have already gone back to its own world…?

data.name: 0012 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The chance is low. Traces of the subject are constantly being identified.

data.name: 0013 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's probably just good at hiding.

data.name: 0014 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As always, the situation isn't great.

data.name: 0017 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: And we can't exactly say Miss Suzumiya's mental state is looking good either.

data.name: 0018 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I was just contacted.

data.name: 0019 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The suspicious organisation Koizumi operates under—the "Agency," right?

data.name: 0020 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's not quite bad enough that closed space is appearing, but…

data.name: 0021 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's only a matter of time.

data.name: 0022 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems like things are only getting worse.

data.name: 0023 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We have no choice but to make a continuous effort to keep Miss Suzumiya distracted.

data.name: 0024 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: As in the aforementioned plan, we'll also have to grab her attention with other things…

data.name: 0025 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's right, I guess…

data.name: 0026 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's all a huge pain, but the world is at stake so what else can I do?

data.name: 0027 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I phrase it like that, it makes us sound like some heroes saving the planet.

data.name: 0028 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Why is it that I don't feel at all like one? Huh, Haruhi?

data.name: 0029 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Good grief…

data.name: 0030 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then, following that guiding principle, we'll lead Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0031 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Because we have no other choice.

data.name: 0032 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If we did, it'd be something along the lines of dragging her out of the building by force.

data.name: 0033 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And there's the fear of getting Haruhi into too much of a bad mood. Ahhh, how annoying.

data.name: 0034 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There's not much time until those two get back. Let's hurry and meet up.

data.name: 0035 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can hear it now… "Waiting outside of the girls toilets? You're awful."

data.name: 0037 (381.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It's okay, I'm certain everything will work out.

data.name: 0038 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina admirably went out of her way to smile and encourage me.

data.name: 0039 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well then, it's about time we head off, don't you think?

data.name: 0040 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You go ahead—I'm gonna clean the wall that Haruhi dirtied with her kick.

data.name: 0042 (381.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Do you mind if I stay and help you, Kyon?

data.name: 0043 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No no, there's absolutely no need.

data.name: 0044 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just that sentiment was enough. Thanks for healing my heart, Asahina.

data.name: 0045 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I'm going ahead.

data.name: 0046 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato walked off followed by Koizumi and then Asahina.

data.name: 0048 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well then, I'd better get rid of these marks…

data.name: 0049 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not that I'm her guardian or personal cleaner or anything.

data.name: 0050 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well then, where's something to wipe with…?

data.name: 0051 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm…?

data.name: 0052 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess that was the strange sensation you'd call feeling a presence.

data.name: 0053 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …What?

data.name: 0054 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What I saw when I looked over my shoulder—it was certainly unexpected—

data.name: 0055 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But at the same time…I felt like I knew it was coming.

data.name: 0056 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wha—?!

data.name: 0057 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Standing there was…

data.name: 0058 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The long-haired girl I saw walking past the window before.

data.name: 0060 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Wait wait wait, is it actually? Couldn't it just be a look-alike?

data.name: 0061 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Tell me I'm wrong, but isn't she a genuine spiritual being?

data.name: 0062 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The possibility isn't zero. If Haruhi really wanted it, even ghosts could surely turn up.

data.name: 0063 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh… Who are you?

data.name: 0065 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Those words I barely managed to get out were lost in the silence.

data.name: 0066 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What is this feeling…?

data.name: 0067 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's like all my hairs are standing on end.

data.name: 0068 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The air is incredibly cold, and yet it's the middle of summer.

data.name: 0070 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh…?

data.name: 0071 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In that moment, the girl who wasn't moving a muscle beckoned me with her hand.

data.name: 0072 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That movement like branches swaying in the wind—for a mere moment, I was captivated—

data.name: 0073 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Uh?!

data.name: 0075 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was an unbelievable sight.

data.name: 0076 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, you're kidding, right…?

data.name: 0077 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This isn't…that abnormal space is it?!

data.name: 0078 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That class 1-10 classroom that Nagato rescued me from earlier…

data.name: 0079 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Seriously? It's happening again…?

data.name: 0080 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I instinctively looked around, and it was as I expected—no doors.

data.name: 0081 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Only these featureless walls serve to seperate me from the outside world.

data.name: 0082 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's as if they've always been there…

data.name: 0083 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Calm down, calm down—I need to cool my head.

data.name: 0084 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What caused me to end up here?

data.name: 0085 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Was it that long-haired girl that sent me here? What is she?

data.name: 0086 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Some spirit that Haruhi created?

data.name: 0087 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Or is she some kind of data lifeform?

data.name: 0088 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not that it matters, but getting trapped in a suspicious classroom like this over and over…

data.name: 0089 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Those bitter memories of when Ryouko Asakura tried to kill me come to mind.

data.name: 0090 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Surely someone's not aiming to kill me this time as well, right?

data.name: 0091 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If they are… I can't afford to waste time.

data.name: 0092 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Huh?

data.name: 0093 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: At that moment, something entered my field of vision.

data.name: 0094 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A laptop…?

data.name: 0095 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In the center of the classroom there was a single laptop left running.

data.name: 0096 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There was one the last time I came here as well. Is this the main body?

data.name: 0097 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Kuh…?!

data.name: 0098 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It seems bad… no rather, it is bad.

data.name: 0099 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Let's assume this is class 1-10.

data.name: 0100 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What was it Haruhi was calling it?

data.name: 0101 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm sure she gave it a considerably ominous nickname.

data.name: 0102 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Right… the "man-eating classroom."

data.name: 0103 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In other words—if I hang about in here, I'm going to get eaten?

data.name: 0104 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: This is bad—This is extremely bad.

data.name: 0105 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What exactly did Haruhi have in mind when she thought this "man-eating classroom" up?

data.name: 0106 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Honestly, it's far too sinister—I don't even want to know.

data.name: 0107 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey! Is there anyone outside?!

data.name: 0108 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato! Koizumi! Asahina!

data.name: 0109 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I went back and forth across the wall, hitting it in search of an exit, but to no avail.

data.name: 0110 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ―But, then.

data.name: 0111 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa?!

data.name: 0112 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A giant mouth emerged onto the classroom's blackboard, baring countless fangs…

data.name: 0113 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: This isn't a joke, Haruhi!!

data.name: 0114 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What should I do? What should I do?!

data.name: 0115 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How did I get out of this last time? Try to remember. Come on brain, try to remember—

data.name: 0116 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: —! The mop!

data.name: 0117 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I just need to wipe that horrific giant mouth with a mop!

data.name: 0118 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I ran to the locker with the cleaning equipment and took out a mop.

data.name: 0119 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just like you did before, get the end of the mop closer to the blackboard—

data.name: 0120 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wha?!

data.name: 0121 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The mop was snapped up by the fangs and easily broken…!

data.name: 0122 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's not all. The big mouth on the blackboard is continuing to get bigger.

data.name: 0123 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And by the way, I feel like it's gradually getting closer to me—

data.name: 0124 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Damn, what do I do? What do I do?!

data.name: 0125 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This laptop is clearly suspicious.

data.name: 0126 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But even so, there's no way of me knowing what I should do with it.

data.name: 0127 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe I should just destroy it?

data.name: 0128 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Or maybe I could enter some kind of password…

data.name: 0129 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You're not just here, so I can write my will, are you? Oi.

data.name: 0130 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Back against the wall—I scowled at the blackboard's giant mouth.

data.name: 0131 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The mop was useless, there's no exit, and as a bonus, I'm about to be eaten.

data.name: 0132 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What on eath should I—

data.name: 0133 (381.ja) UNKNOWN (？？？)
data.value: Move.

data.name: 0134 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A voice came from behind me.

data.name: 0135 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: N-Nagato? Is that Nagato?!

data.name: 0136 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A crack ran across the wall, splitting it accompanied by the sound of breaking glass.

data.name: 0137 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What came from the crack was…

data.name: 0139 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It's not too late.

data.name: 0140 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Looks like you haven't been harmed at all.

data.name: 0141 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato! And Koizumi…!

data.name: 0142 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This is another perilous situation indeed. I see—it's certainly a man-eating classroom.

data.name: 0143 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Now's not the time to chat. We need to get out of here fast, or we'll all be "out!"

data.name: 0144 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: We can't.

data.name: 0145 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh…?

data.name: 0146 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Behind Nagato, the broken wall returned to normal with an almighty force.

data.name: 0147 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what on earth…?!

data.name: 0148 (381.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: There was a high chance that we wouldn't have time to deal with it from the outside.

data.name: 0149 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not have time…?

data.name: 0150 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The data lifeform is trying to increase its existance probability in this space.

data.name: 0151 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: In other words, our lives are in danger as long as we're in here?

data.name: 0152 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0153 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But what are you guys planning to do about it now you're in here?

data.name: 0154 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Use this…

data.name: 0155 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Saying so, Nagato once again handed me a mop.

data.name: 0156 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I just tried that, but it was completely useless.

data.name: 0157 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Without appended attribute data it's a mere mop.

data.name: 0158 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So you're telling me this is no longer a mere mop?

data.name: 0159 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes. Use this to destroy the singularities that keep this space stabilized.

data.name: 0160 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You want me to play clean up again? At such a critical time?

data.name: 0161 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0162 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You can see that blackboard as well, right Nagato?

data.name: 0163 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I can see. It's not a major obstacle.

data.name: 0164 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With her usual nonchalance, Nagato held her hand over the blackboard.

data.name: 0165 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In that moment, the blackboard returned to its original form with great force.

data.name: 0166 (381.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I will restrain it, so do it now.

data.name: 0167 (381.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, got it! If I just do it, everything will be fine, right!?

data.name: 0168 (381.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Because if worse comes to worst, I'll become a real spirit and haunt you, Haruhi!

data.name: 0169 (381.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: About Haruhi
